pr_title: FLEX-5428: changed transition messages to DARK/LIGHT

timeline.message: FLEX-5428: changed transition messages to DARK/LIGHT
FLEX-5428: removed useless declartion of exception
FLEX-5428: Still work in progress.. just for handover to Ruud
FLEX-5428: 60870-104 adapter does not send a list to core anymore
FLEX-5428: fixed test where list was expected instead of an eventNotificationDTO
FLEX-5428: added unit test for EVENT_NOTIFICATION resulting form Dark/light event
FLEX-5428: Removed throwing of NotSupportedException due to Sonar warning

timeline.bodyText: Why is it necessary to send the full dataContainer for each of the events?
timeline.author: rlemmers

timeline.bodyText: Doesn't removing this @SuppressWarnings annotation cause a new issue in Sonar?
timeline.author: rlemmers

replies.bodyText: No, at least not on my machine (that should have the same ruleset)
replies.author: joostknapen

timeline.bodyText: What we test isn't obvious to me by reading the title. I would name it something like "sendsLightSensorEventToDomain".
timeline.author: rlemmers

replies.bodyText: Hmm, the test should test if a LIGHT_SENSOR_REPORTS_LIGHT event is sent to domain. So maybe a combination of both is a good one.. sendsLightSensorReportsLightEventToDomain
replies.author: joostknapen

timeline.bodyText: The handleEvent(String, EventNotificationDto) method calls handleEvent(String, Date, ...). Directly call that second method. You could write a separate test if you want to show handleEvent(String, EventNotificationDto) calls handleEvent(String, Date, ...) correctly.
timeline.author: rlemmers

replies.bodyText: But this tests results in a bit higher code coverage ;-)
replies.author: joostknapen

timeline.bodyText: Test for the call "this.domainRequestService.send(...)", which is a call to another service instead of a private method. This would also simplify your test a bit.
timeline.author: rlemmers

replies.bodyText: There are 2 paths that lead to this.domainRequestService.send. Only one path is valid,  therefore I think the current solution is a better test. Although a bit more complicated.
replies.author: joostknapen

timeline.message: FLEX-5428: Changed name of light event test

timeline.author: joostknapen
